item.title: Mobile First Design Tips
item.description: Last weekend I released an updated version of my blog and website that share a similar design. I decided to go with a mobile-first approach when it came to the design, which is a tried and tested way to create responsive web applications. Along the way, I tripped up and made a few mistakes that cost me some time and rework, but could have been easily corrected had I had these tips beforehand.
